title: NASA Worm as Art
summary: Museum of Modern Art Opens Exhibition Featuring NASA Worm The iconic NASA logotype, commonly known as the worm and designed by Bruce Blackburn and Richard Danne in 1976, was premiered Tuesday, Jan. 23, 2025 at the Museum of Modern Art (MoMA) in New York as part of its new exhibition “Pirouette: Turning Points in Design,” […]
